Text.Page:
From what I know of gulas, their alliance with the nagas is a business arrangement. What I'd like to know is, what kind of business?

And what do the {@LinkCreature:42#1200#naga masakari} know about it?

Let me know what you find out.
I don't know what you've got there, but {@LinkCreature:242#1036#Bartosia} might be able to make sense of it. Ask her to look it over.
Are the {@LinkCreature:42#1200#naga masakaris} a bit tougher than you expected? I hope you're up to the job, <PCNAME>.

It's basically a contract. It says the gulas provide the muscle, the nagas kidnap people from around Frontera and deliver them back to the gulas. Oh, no...

It also says the gulas are selling those people into slavery.

Ibar needs to know of this right away. Go to Frontera as soon as you can.
